name: Fantasy Monster
description: "FantasyMonster is building an NFT play-to-earn game where players will be able to take on the role of a warrior tasked with defeating demons. Players will be able to sell their acquired NFTs for the FTS tokens. Currently, FantasyMonster has a demo game available. By Q3 2022, FantasyMonster aims to have Craft System, Skill System, FPS token Staking, and Player versus Player game mode developed."
